title: Championship basketball highlights: 1975-76
brief_description: Includes highlights of the various basketball competitions in the USA during 1975-76. The Junior College Basketball Championship, the NAIA Championship, the NCAA Division II Championship, the AIAW National Championship, the NCAA University Division Championship, the NBA and the ABA Championship are all covered. Interspersed with these is a segment on a basketball camp, in Homesdale, Penn., the talented Tripuca family, and the Converse All America Team.
